#Brainstorm


##Loading data
```{r}
library(tidyverse)

store <- read_delim("data/sales_data_2017_2018.csv")

store %>% 
  dim()

names(store)

store %>% 
sample_n(10)

```
##Seeing What kinds of products there are and their prices

```{r}
store %>% 
  summarise(items = n_distinct(item_name))
```
